NanoKnife IRE is a cutting-edge technique which has shown very promising results in a series of clinical trials, particularly in its superior preservation of continence and erectile function as compared to Radical Prostatectomy.In one study conducted in Australia between 2013 and 2018, 123 prostate cancer patients were treated with NanoKnife IRE, with a follow up of up to 6 years.In one study conducted in Australia between 2013 and 2018, 123 prostate cancer patients were treated with Nanoknife, with a follow up of up to 6 years.97% were cured using NanoKnife IRE alone15% had a recurrence within 5 years3% needed to progress to full gland treatment within 3 years99% had no issue with urinary continence after the treatment.76% reported no change in erectile function Name
